titles.title: Mammoth Cave National Park Boundary Adjustment Act of 2022
Mammoth Cave National Park Boundary Adjustment Act of 2022
A bill to modify the boundary of the Mammoth Cave National Park in the State of Kentucky.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Mammoth Cave National Park Boundary Adjustment Act of 2022
This bill authorizes the Department of the Interior to acquire specified acres of land for inclusion in the Mammoth Cave National Park in Kentucky.
